required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Retinal Function in Relation to Transient or Chronic Challenges to Retinal Metabolism
clinical_study.official_title: Retinal Function in Relation to Transient or Chronic Challenges to Retinal Metabolism

oversight_info.authority: Denmark: The Regional Committee on Biomedical Research Ethics

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to investigate how the retina adapts to different metabolic challenges, e.g. chronic systemic hypoxia, hyperglycemia, special training conditions or diets as well as transient changes in the content of oxygen and glucose in the blood.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Non-Randomized, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before hyperoxia, after 15 minutes of hyperoxia, 30 minutes after ending hyperoxia
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of retinal vessel diameters before, during and after hyperoxic stimulation.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before hyperoxia, after 15 minutes of hyperoxia, 30 minutes after ending hyperoxia
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of retinal perfusion velocities before, during and after hyperoxic stimulation.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before hyperoxia, after 15 minutes of hyperoxia, 30 minutes after ending hyperoxia
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of retinal oximetry status before, during and after hyperoxic stimulation.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before glucose ingestion, every 30 minutes for 3 hours following oral glucose load
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of retinal vessel diameters before, during and after hyperglycemic stimulation.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before glucose ingestion, every 30 minutes for 3 hours following oral glucose load
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of retinal perfusion velocities before, during and after hyperglycemic stimulation.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Before glucose ingestion, every 30 minutes for 3 hours following oral glucose load
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of retinal oximetry status before, during and after hyperglycemic stimulation.

intervention.other_name: Hyperoxia is achieved by short-term pure oxygen breathing.

criteria.textblock:
Healthy individuals
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy volunteers.
- No known systemic or ocular disease.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any systemic or ocular disease.
Patients with diabetes
Inclusion criteria:
- Diabetes mellitus
- No intraocular disease other than conditions attributable to diabetes.
Exclusion criteria:
- Intraocular disease other than conditions attributable to diabetes.
- Systemic conditions which might contraindicate hyperoxic stimulation.

facility.name: Department of Ophthalmology, Glostrup University Hospital
